snippet: The contract to outfit and equip the Wolverines’ 31 varsity teams could be worth as much as $169 million.
abstract: University of Michigan's apparel contract with Nike could reportedly be worth $169 million.
lead_paragraph: The contract to outfit and equip the Wolverines’ 31 varsity teams could be worth as much as $169 million.

headline.main: Michigan’s Nike Deal Among Richest in College Sports
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Colleges; Michigan in Nike Deal
